TopicTitle: XP Luna style for Vista. IGNORE TOPIC

Articles.Content:
Does anyone here know how to get a .theme file for Luna that works with Vista? I\'ve been searching the web with no luck. .rar files won\'t work for me with WinRAR, WindowBlinds doesn\'t have an official version with the free trial, etc. :\'(

Preferably not something i\'d have to pay for.

EDIT: Also, if you could, tell how to install it too.

Got it to work.

YEEEEAH
